channel.title: CVE Feed for Ivanti -- Avalanche
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Ivanti -- Avalanche

item.title: CVE-2023-32563|2024-10-09T19:33:20.650Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: An unauthenticated attacker could achieve the code execution through a RemoteControl server.

item.title: CVE-2023-32564|2024-10-09T19:33:58.502Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: An unrestricted upload of file with dangerous type vulnerability exists in Avalanche versions 6.4.1 and below that could allow an attacker to achieve a remove code execution.

item.title: CVE-2024-47008|2024-10-08T18:45:02.588Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: Server-side request forgery in Ivanti Avalanche before version 6.4.5 allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to leak sensitive information.

item.title: CVE-2024-47007|2024-10-08T18:46:21.255Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: A NULL pointer dereference in WLAvalancheService.exe of Ivanti Avalanche before version 6.4.5 allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to cause a denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2024-47010|2024-10-08T16:29:57.222Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: Path Traversal in Ivanti Avalanche before version 6.4.5 allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to bypass authentication.

item.title: CVE-2024-47008|2024-10-08T16:28:14.887Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: Server-side request forgery in Ivanti Avalanche before version 6.4.5 allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to leak sensitive information.

item.title: CVE-2024-47007|2024-10-08T16:27:46.696Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: A NULL pointer dereference in WLAvalancheService.exe of Ivanti Avalanche before version 6.4.5 allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to cause a denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2024-47011|2024-10-08T16:31:55.973Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: Path Traversal in Ivanti Avalanche before version 6.4.5 allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to leak sensitive information

item.title: CVE-2024-47009|2024-10-08T16:28:53.641Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: Path Traversal in Ivanti Avalanche before version 6.4.5 allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to bypass authentication.

item.title: CVE-2024-29848|2024-09-19T01:53:11.340Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: An unrestricted file upload vulnerability in web component of Ivanti Avalanche before 6.4.x allows an authenticated, privileged user to execute arbitrary commands as SYSTEM.

item.title: CVE-2024-37373|2024-08-16T03:56:42.004Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: Improper input validation in the Central Filestore in Ivanti Avalanche 6.3.1 allows a remote authenticated attacker with admin rights to achieve RCE.

item.title: CVE-2024-38653|2024-08-14T13:47:52.793Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: XXE in SmartDeviceServer in Ivanti Avalanche 6.3.1 allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to read arbitrary files on the server.

item.title: CVE-2024-37399|2024-08-14T13:46:39.793Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: A NULL pointer dereference in WLAvalancheService in Ivanti Avalanche 6.3.1 allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to crash the service, resulting in a DoS.

item.title: CVE-2024-37373|2024-08-14T13:38:29.723Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: Improper input validation in the Central Filestore in Ivanti Avalanche 6.3.1 allows a remote authenticated attacker with admin rights to achieve RCE.

item.title: CVE-2024-38652|2024-08-14T13:28:51.173Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: Path traversal in the skin management component of Ivanti Avalanche 6.3.1 allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to achieve denial of service via arbitrary file deletion.

item.title: CVE-2024-22061|2024-08-01T22:35:34.718Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: A Heap Overflow vulnerability in WLInfoRailService component of Ivanti Avalanche before 6.4.3 allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to execute arbitrary commands

item.title: CVE-2024-29204|2024-06-04T17:58:19.523Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: A Heap Overflow vulnerability in WLAvalancheService component of Ivanti Avalanche before 6.4.3 allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to execute arbitrary commands

item.title: CVE-2024-29848|2024-06-04T17:57:36.120Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: An unrestricted file upload vulnerability in web component of Ivanti Avalanche before 6.4.x allows an authenticated, privileged user to execute arbitrary commands as SYSTEM.

item.title: CVE-2024-22061|2024-06-04T17:52:32.847Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: A Heap Overflow vulnerability in WLInfoRailService component of Ivanti Avalanche before 6.4.3 allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to execute arbitrary commands

item.title: CVE-2024-27975|2024-06-04T17:47:33.712Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: An Use-after-free vulnerability in WLAvalancheService component of Ivanti Avalanche before 6.4.3 allows a remote authenticated attacker to execute arbitrary commands as SYSTEM.

item.title: CVE-2024-27978|2024-06-04T17:47:22.296Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: A Null Pointer Dereference vulnerability in WLAvalancheService component of Ivanti Avalanche before 6.4.3 allows an authenticated remote attacker to perform denial of service attacks.

item.title: CVE-2024-27984|2024-06-04T17:46:56.956Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: A Path Traversal vulnerability in web component of Ivanti Avalanche before 6.4.3 allows a remote authenticated attacker to delete specific type of files and/or cause denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2024-27977|2024-06-04T17:46:37.939Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: A Path Traversal vulnerability in web component of Ivanti Avalanche before 6.4.3 allows a remote authenticated attacker to delete arbitrary files, thereby leading to Denial-of-Service.

item.title: CVE-2024-27976|2024-06-04T17:46:19.979Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: A Path Traversal vulnerability in web component of Ivanti Avalanche before 6.4.3 allows a remote authenticated attacker to execute arbitrary commands as SYSTEM.

item.title: CVE-2024-23526|2024-06-04T17:46:03.520Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: An out-of-bounds read vulnerability in WLAvalancheService component of Ivanti Avalanche before 6.4.3, in certain conditions can allow an unauthenticated remote attacker to read sensitive information in memory.

item.title: CVE-2024-23530|2024-06-04T17:46:03.124Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: An out-of-bounds read vulnerability in WLAvalancheService component of Ivanti Avalanche before 6.4.3, in certain conditions can allow an unauthenticated remote attacker to read sensitive information in memory.

item.title: CVE-2024-23531|2024-06-04T17:45:59.214Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: An Integer Overflow vulnerability in WLInfoRailService component of Ivanti Avalanche before 6.4.3 allows an unauthenticated remote attacker to perform denial of service attacks. In certain rare conditions this could also lead to reading content from memory.

item.title: CVE-2024-23527|2024-04-24T23:12:51.975Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: An out-of-bounds read vulnerability in WLAvalancheService component of Ivanti Avalanche before 6.4.3, in certain conditions can allow an unauthenticated remote attacker to read sensitive information in memory.

item.description: An out-of-bounds read vulnerability in WLAvalancheService component of Ivanti Avalanche before 6.4.3, in certain conditions can allow an unauthenticated remote attacker to read sensitive information in memory.

item.title: CVE-2024-23532|2024-06-04T17:45:52.608Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: An out-of-bounds Read vulnerability in WLAvalancheService component of Ivanti Avalanche before 6.4.3 allows an authenticated remote attacker to perform denial of service attacks. In certain conditions this could also lead to remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2024-23533|2024-06-04T17:45:49.282Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: An out-of-bounds read vulnerability in WLAvalancheService component of Ivanti Avalanche before 6.4.3, in certain conditions can allow an authenticated remote attacker to read sensitive information in memory.

item.description: An Unrestricted File-upload vulnerability in web component of Ivanti Avalanche before 6.4.3 allows a remote authenticated attacker to execute arbitrary commands as SYSTEM.
